AssetModelCompositeModel.description: Contains a composite model definition in an asset model. This composite model definition is applied to all assets created from the asset model.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description for the asset composite model.

type.description: A description for the asset composite model.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: A unique, friendly name for the asset composite model.

type.description: A unique, friendly name for the asset composite model.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The type of the composite model. For alarm composite models, this type is AWS/ALARM

type.description: The type of the composite model. For alarm composite models, this type is AWS/ALARM

properties.name: CompositeModelProperties
properties.description: The property definitions of the asset model. You can specify up to 200 properties per asset model.

type.description: The property definitions of the asset model. You can specify up to 200 properties per asset model.

AssetModelProperty.description: Contains information about an asset model property.

properties.name: LogicalId
properties.description: Customer provided ID for property.

type.description: Customer provided ID for property.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the asset model property.

type.description: The name of the asset model property.

properties.name: DataType
properties.description: The data type of the asset model property.

type.description: The data type of the asset model property.

properties.name: DataTypeSpec
properties.description: The data type of the structure for this property.

type.description: The data type of the structure for this property.

properties.name: Unit
properties.description: The unit of the asset model property, such as Newtons or RPM.

type.description: The unit of the asset model property, such as Newtons or RPM.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The property type

type.description: The property type

PropertyType.description: Contains a property type, which can be one of attribute, measurement, metric, or transform.

properties.name: Expression
properties.description: The mathematical expression that defines the transformation function. You can specify up to 10 functions per expression.

type.description: The mathematical expression that defines the transformation function. You can specify up to 10 functions per expression.

properties.name: Variables
properties.description: The list of variables used in the expression.

type.description: The list of variables used in the expression.

properties.name: Expression
properties.description: The mathematical expression that defines the metric aggregation function. You can specify up to 10 functions per expression.

type.description: The mathematical expression that defines the metric aggregation function. You can specify up to 10 functions per expression.

properties.name: Variables
properties.description: The list of variables used in the expression.

type.description: The list of variables used in the expression.

properties.name: Window
properties.description: The window (time interval) over which AWS IoT SiteWise computes the metric's aggregation expression

type.description: The window (time interval) over which AWS IoT SiteWise computes the metric's aggregation expression

MetricWindow.description: Contains a time interval window used for data aggregate computations (for example, average, sum, count, and so on).

TumblingWindow.description: Contains a tumbling window, which is a repeating fixed-sized, non-overlapping, and contiguous time interval. This window is used in metric and aggregation computations.

Interval.description: The time interval for the tumbling window.

Offset.description: The shift or reference point on timeline for the contiguous time intervals.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The friendly name of the variable to be used in the expression.

type.description: The friendly name of the variable to be used in the expression.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The variable that identifies an asset property from which to use values.

type.description: The variable that identifies an asset property from which to use values.

AssetModelHierarchy.description: Contains information about an asset model hierarchy.

properties.name: LogicalId
properties.description: Customer provided ID for hierarchy.

type.description: Customer provided ID for hierarchy.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the asset model hierarchy.

type.description: The name of the asset model hierarchy.

properties.name: ChildAssetModelId
properties.description: The ID of the asset model. All assets in this hierarchy must be instances of the child AssetModelId asset model.

type.description: The ID of the asset model. All assets in this hierarchy must be instances of the child AssetModelId asset model.

properties.name: AssetModelName
properties.description: A unique, friendly name for the asset model.

type.description: A unique, friendly name for the asset model.

properties.name: AssetModelDescription
properties.description: A description for the asset model.

type.description: A description for the asset model.

properties.name: AssetModelProperties
properties.description: The property definitions of the asset model. You can specify up to 200 properties per asset model.

type.description: The property definitions of the asset model. You can specify up to 200 properties per asset model.

properties.name: AssetModelCompositeModels
properties.description: The composite asset models that are part of this asset model. Composite asset models are asset models that contain specific properties.

type.description: The composite asset models that are part of this asset model. Composite asset models are asset models that contain specific properties.

properties.name: AssetModelHierarchies
properties.description: The hierarchy definitions of the asset model. Each hierarchy specifies an asset model whose assets can be children of any other assets created from this asset model. You can specify up to 10 hierarchies per asset model.

type.description: The hierarchy definitions of the asset model. Each hierarchy specifies an asset model whose assets can be children of any other assets created from this asset model. You can specify up to 10 hierarchies per asset model.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset model.

type.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset model.

properties.name: AssetModelId
properties.description: The ID of the asset model.

type.description: The ID of the asset model.

properties.name: AssetModelArn
properties.description: The ARN of the asset model, which has the following format.

type.description: The ARN of the asset model, which has the following format.
